PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2011-07212011-06-23AAFC,  ,  ,  , 
ActFarm Products Agencies Act
PrecisOrder (a) terminating the appointment of the firm of KINGSTON ROSS PASNAK of Edmonton, Alberta, as the auditor for the Canadian Beef Cattle Research, Market Development and Promotion Agency, effective June 30, 2011; and (b) appointing the firm of MEYERS NORRIS PENNY LLP of Calgary, Alberta, to be the auditor for the Canadian Beef Cattle Research, Market Development and Promotion Agency, to audit its accounts and financial transactions for the fiscal period commencing July 1, 2011 and ending June 30, 2016.
AttachmentsAttachment
